name: What are BAâ€™s NEW SUITES like during LOCKDOWN?
description:
I booked this flight for the price of an economy ticket.... let me explain all. 
Today I'm trying a new Business Class, but thanks to lockdown it's quite different to usual... British Airways Club Suites. How has it changed? 

Disclaimer: This was filmed as part of essential corporate travel, and is in no way personal travel. 

Follow me on IG: will.luxurytravel
